description: Returns information about all provisioned clusters if no cluster identifier is specified, or about a specific cache cluster if a cluster identifier is supplied. By default, abbreviated information about the clusters is returned. You can use the optional ShowCacheNodeInfo flag to retrieve detailed information about the cache nodes associated with the clusters. These details include the DNS address and port for the cache node endpoint. If the cluster is in the creating state, only cluster-level information is displayed until all of the nodes are successfully provisioned. If the cluster is in the deleting state, only cluster-level information is displayed. If cache nodes are currently being added to the cluster, node endpoint information and creation time for the additional nodes are not displayed until they are completely provisioned. When the cluster state is available, the cluster is ready for use. If cache nodes are currently being removed from the cluster, no endpoint information for the removed nodes is displayed.

parameters.name: MaxRecords
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to include in the response. If more records exist than the specified MaxRecords value, a marker is included in the response so that the remaining results can be retrieved. Default: 100 Constraints: minimum 20; maximum 100.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: Provides an identifier to allow retrieval of paginated results.

nested_items.name: CacheClusters
nested_items.description: A list of clusters. Each item in the list contains detailed information about one cluster.

nested_items.name: CacheClusterId
nested_items.description: The user-supplied identifier of the cluster. This identifier is a unique key that identifies a cluster.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationEndpoint
nested_items.description: Represents a Memcached cluster endpoint which can be used by an application to connect to any node in the cluster. The configuration endpoint will always have .cfg in it.

nested_items.name: Address
nested_items.description: The DNS hostname of the cache node.

nested_items.name: Port
nested_items.description: The port number that the cache engine is listening on.

nested_items.name: ClientDownloadLandingPage
nested_items.description: The URL of the web page where you can download the latest ElastiCache client library.

nested_items.name: CacheNodeType
nested_items.description: The name of the compute and memory capacity node type for the cluster.

nested_items.name: M7g node types
nested_items.type: not recommended. Existing clusters are still supported but creation of new clusters is not supported for these types.
nested_items.description: General purpose:

nested_items.name: C1 node types:
nested_items.type: not recommended. Existing clusters are still supported but creation of new clusters is not supported for these types.
nested_items.description: Compute optimized:

nested_items.name: C1 node types:
nested_items.type: not recommended. Existing clusters are still supported but creation of new clusters is not supported for these types.

nested_items.name: R7g node types
nested_items.type: not recommended. Existing clusters are still supported but creation of new clusters is not supported for these types.
nested_items.description: Memory optimized:

nested_items.name: Engine
nested_items.description: The name of the cache engine ( memcached or redis) to be used for this cluster.

nested_items.name: EngineVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the cache engine that is used in this cluster.

nested_items.name: CacheClusterStatus
nested_items.description: The current state of this cluster, one of the following values: available, creating, deleted, deleting, incompatible-network, modifying, rebooting cluster nodes, restore-failed, or snapshotting.

nested_items.name: NumCacheNodes
nested_items.description: The number of cache nodes in the cluster.

nested_items.name: PreferredAvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: The name of the Availability Zone in which the cluster is located or 'Multiple' if the cache nodes are located in different Availability Zones.

nested_items.name: PreferredOutpostArn
nested_items.description: The outpost ARN in which the cache cluster is created.

nested_items.name: CacheClusterCreateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the cluster was created.

nested_items.name: PreferredMaintenanceWindow
nested_items.description: Specifies the weekly time range during which maintenance on the cluster is performed. It is specified as a range in the format ddd:hh24:mi-ddd:hh24:mi (24H Clock UTC). The minimum maintenance window is a 60 minute period.
sun.
mon.
tue.
wed.
thu.
fri.
sat.

nested_items.name: PendingModifiedValues
nested_items.description: A group of settings that are applied to the cluster in the future, or that are currently being applied.

nested_items.name: NumCacheNodes
nested_items.description: The new number of cache nodes for the cluster.

nested_items.name: CacheNodeIdsToRemove
nested_items.description: A list of cache node IDs that are being removed (or will be removed) from the cluster. A node ID is a 4-digit numeric identifier (0001, 0002, etc.).
(string) ---

nested_items.name: EngineVersion
nested_items.description: The new cache engine version that the cluster runs.

nested_items.name: CacheNodeType
nested_items.description: The cache node type that this cluster or replication group is scaled to.

nested_items.name: AuthTokenStatus
nested_items.description: The auth token status.

nested_items.name: LogDeliveryConfigurations
nested_items.description: The log delivery configurations being modified.

nested_items.name: LogType
nested_items.description: Refers to slow-log or engine-log..

nested_items.name: DestinationType
nested_items.description: Returns the destination type, either CloudWatch Logs or Kinesis Data Firehose.

nested_items.name: DestinationDetails
nested_items.description: Configuration details of either a CloudWatch Logs destination or Kinesis Data Firehose destination.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchLogsDetails
nested_items.description: The configuration details of the CloudWatch Logs destination.

nested_items.name: LogGroup
nested_items.description: The name of the CloudWatch Logs log group.

nested_items.name: KinesisFirehoseDetails
nested_items.description: The configuration details of the Kinesis Data Firehose destination.

nested_items.name: DeliveryStream
nested_items.description: The name of the Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream.

nested_items.name: LogFormat
nested_items.description: Returns the log format, either JSON or TEXT.

nested_items.name: TransitEncryptionEnabled
nested_items.description: A flag that enables in-transit encryption when set to true.

nested_items.name: TransitEncryptionMode
nested_items.description: A setting that allows you to migrate your clients to use in-transit encryption, with no downtime.

nested_items.name: ScaleConfig
nested_items.description: The scaling configuration changes that are pending for the Memcached cluster.

nested_items.name: ScalePercentage
nested_items.description: The percentage by which to scale the Memcached cluster, either horizontally by adding nodes or vertically by increasing resources.

nested_items.name: ScaleIntervalMinutes
nested_items.description: The time interval in seconds between scaling operations when performing gradual scaling for a Memcached cluster.

nested_items.name: NotificationConfiguration
nested_items.description: Describes a notification topic and its status. Notification topics are used for publishing ElastiCache events to subscribers using Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS).

nested_items.name: TopicArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies the topic.

nested_items.name: TopicStatus
nested_items.description: The current state of the topic.

nested_items.name: CacheSecurityGroups
nested_items.description: A list of cache security group elements, composed of name and status sub-elements.

nested_items.name: CacheSecurityGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the cache security group.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The membership status in the cache security group. The status changes when a cache security group is modified, or when the cache security groups assigned to a cluster are modified.

nested_items.name: CacheParameterGroup
nested_items.description: Status of the cache parameter group.

nested_items.name: CacheParameterGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the cache parameter group.

nested_items.name: ParameterApplyStatus
nested_items.description: The status of parameter updates.

nested_items.name: CacheNodeIdsToReboot
nested_items.description: A list of the cache node IDs which need to be rebooted for parameter changes to be applied. A node ID is a numeric identifier (0001, 0002, etc.).
(string) ---

nested_items.name: CacheSubnetGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the cache subnet group associated with the cluster.

nested_items.name: CacheNodes
nested_items.description: A list of cache nodes that are members of the cluster.

nested_items.name: M7g node types
nested_items.type: not recommended. Existing clusters are still supported but creation of new clusters is not supported for these types.

nested_items.name: AutoMinorVersionUpgrade
nested_items.description: If you are running Valkey or Redis OSS engine version 6.0 or later, set this parameter to yes if you want to opt-in to the next auto minor version upgrade campaign. This parameter is disabled for previous versions.

nested_items.name: SecurityGroups
nested_items.description: A list of VPC Security Groups associated with the cluster.

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the cache security group.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the cache security group membership. The status changes whenever a cache security group is modified, or when the cache security groups assigned to a cluster are modified.

nested_items.name: ReplicationGroupId
nested_items.description: The replication group to which this cluster belongs. If this field is empty, the cluster is not associated with any replication group.

nested_items.name: SnapshotRetentionLimit
nested_items.description: The number of days for which ElastiCache retains automatic cluster snapshots before deleting them. For example, if you set SnapshotRetentionLimit to 5, a snapshot that was taken today is retained for 5 days before being deleted.

nested_items.name: SnapshotWindow
nested_items.description: The daily time range (in UTC) during which ElastiCache begins taking a daily snapshot of your cluster.

nested_items.name: AuthTokenEnabled
nested_items.description: A flag that enables using an AuthToken (password) when issuing Valkey or Redis OSS commands.

nested_items.name: AuthTokenLastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date the auth token was last modified.

nested_items.name: TransitEncryptionEnabled
nested_items.description: A flag that enables in-transit encryption when set to true.

nested_items.name: AtRestEncryptionEnabled
nested_items.description: A flag that enables encryption at-rest when set to true.

nested_items.name: ARN
nested_items.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) of the cache cluster.

nested_items.name: ReplicationGroupLogDeliveryEnabled
nested_items.description: A boolean value indicating whether log delivery is enabled for the replication group.

nested_items.name: LogDeliveryConfigurations
nested_items.description: Returns the destination, format and type of the logs.

nested_items.name: LogType
nested_items.description: Refers to slow-log or engine-log.

nested_items.name: DestinationType
nested_items.description: Returns the destination type, either cloudwatch-logs or kinesis-firehose.

nested_items.name: DestinationDetails
nested_items.description: Configuration details of either a CloudWatch Logs destination or Kinesis Data Firehose destination.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchLogsDetails
nested_items.description: The configuration details of the CloudWatch Logs destination.

nested_items.name: LogGroup
nested_items.description: The name of the CloudWatch Logs log group.

nested_items.name: KinesisFirehoseDetails
nested_items.description: The configuration details of the Kinesis Data Firehose destination.

nested_items.name: DeliveryStream
nested_items.description: The name of the Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream.

nested_items.name: LogFormat
nested_items.description: Returns the log format, either JSON or TEXT.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Returns the log delivery configuration status. Values are one of enabling | disabling | modifying | active | error.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: Returns an error message for the log delivery configuration.

nested_items.name: NetworkType
nested_items.description: Must be either ipv4 | ipv6 | dual_stack. IPv6 is supported for workloads using Valkey 7.2 and above, Redis OSS engine version 6.2 7.1 or Memcached engine version 1.6.6 and above on all instances built on the Nitro system.

nested_items.name: IpDiscovery
nested_items.description: The network type associated with the cluster, either ipv4 | ipv6. IPv6 is supported for workloads using Valkey 7.2 and above, Redis OSS engine version 6.2 to 7.1 or Memcached engine version 1.6.6 and above on all instances built on the Nitro system.

nested_items.name: TransitEncryptionMode
nested_items.description: A setting that allows you to migrate your clients to use in-transit encryption, with no downtime.
